title: Andy: poor customer service
text: I had a coupon from a free bottle that i forgot to put in my cart. Andy gave me a hard time about sending it on so i had to refuse the delivery and place a new order for the same thing. I've given these guys lots of business over the year but boy have they gone down hill. They have so many competitors now I think this will be my last order from them.

title: Buyer Beware, return policy is bogus
text: After many back & forth emails with slow replies from the company (also them dodging the issue hence so many emails) I found out that they do not accept returns on opened products that I am unsatisfied with and, in the last email from them, they advised me to consider ordering a free sample before making any future purchases. Something felt fishy with them not responding promptly and how they worded their emails. Their website states their headquarters are located in Chicago but I wonder if they are based in China.  This could be a Chinese supplement company with a facade of being an American company.  From the return policy to the faulty Chicago headquarters address, they whole vibe feels deceptive. Plus, I am unhappy with the products I received but they refuse to honor a return/refund. Yes you get an order sent to you but the legitimacy of the company and quality is overall sketchy. Buyer beware, not all is what it appears to be.

title: Sent it regular mail instead of courier…
text: Sent it regular mail instead of courier I paid a lot for and don't respond to support requests

title: I never received my package.
text: I never received my package! And I've tried to contact liftmode multiple times and no response! I'm super pissed and I think I'm going to contact the BBB!

title: It has been nearly a week since I…
text: It has been nearly a week since I placed an order and the order status is still listed as "processing". I have sent multiple emails requesting updates on my order and have heard nothing back.Starting to wonder if this company has gone out of business and if I should be contacting my bank to get my money back..

title: Same name different product…
text: It has been a few years since I’ve ordered Liftmode phenibut hcl, when I had it then. It was tasteless and I would take one or two serving before bed I would experience the most realistic dreams so much that waking up was going to sleep. Now that there’s been some change to the formula I haven’t consumed a single serving due to its different consistency, sour taste, and my doubtfulness of its new effects.

title: Didn't receive package.
text: My package was supposed to be delivered today. Took a little over a week though I hit the threshold for free 2-3 day shipping. Package wasn't delivered. Says "delivered to parcel locker" which we don't have. Pretty upset.

title: Never received package
text: Never received package. I reached out with several emails to liftmode and the last one was so unprofessional on their part. You don’t want to keep a customer using your site of several years? Fine with me. I have since filed a claim with usps. But I would consider hiring better people to reply to your emails in a professional way.

title: I purchased phenibut powder from…
text: I purchased phenibut powder from LiftMode and received it pretty quickly. I opened the box carefully, everything looks well, but when I unscrewed the cap of the bottle containing the phenibut powder, I gagged, almost vomit, it emits a strong stench, it smells like a very filthy person spit on it many times. I would not ingest such a stinky and yuck and gross and disgusting phenibut powder, even though they have a test report. And even if the whole world doesn't sell phenibut powder, I would not buy from LiftMode either.

title: Phenibut discontinued
text: They didn’t announce or let anybody know that Phenibut was going to be discontinued. This will cause many issues for users of this nootropic especially with side effects of coming off so quickly.

title: I never received my phenibut
text: I never received my phenibut, it said it got dropped off according to the tracking but nothing was here and I watched for it the whole time. Can I please get a new one sent to me at my new address which I will know of here in the next few days?

title: The wrong thing was sending me a review…
text: The wrong thing was sending me a review as if I received the product... I got my hopes up and went to the mailbox the day after receiving such email expecting to receive this product so I can have fun tonight... I already have low expectations after reading the horrendous shipping issue reviews and after realizing the product DIDNT arrive I got even more disappointed. Hopefully I can get the dang thing for the price I paid. Maybe I'll leave a better one after I get the product....

title: Not the LiftMode I remember
text: Unwilling to contact me back. Before they were always on point, now they ignore you. Even though I’ve made half a dozen purchases before.Must be new owners. Either way the customer service is absolutely terrible now. Several emails sent without a response. The Trustpilot reviews are shockingly high in my opinion now as they don’t seem to care one bit about their customers with several prior purchases.Something fishy is going on with LiftMode. Never had an issue when Leo was around. Check out my prior review of LiftMode compared to this one. 5* vs 0* if I could give that.Also my antivirus considers LiftMode’s website suspicious now. And it’s the top antivirus protection you can get.

title: Discontinued product
text: I've been a loyal customer for 8 years and they decided to discontinue the product I have been purchasing with no warning. When I emailed a month ago they stated they had no plans to discontinue. I loved Liftmode up until this point but a little transparency would have been nice.

title: This is a review of the Kanna elixir…
text: This is a review of the Kanna elixir product only; I want to emphasise this as I find the people at liftmode to be nice. The Kanna elixir did not agree with me at all. Made me feel extremely depressed and gave me major heart palpitations, to the point where I needed to visit the emergency room. Kanna is not a product for everyone and can be dangerous (max I ever took was one dropper, so definitely on the lower end in terms of dosage). I’d like to see more done by liftmode to highlight the potential dangers of the product

title: DO NOT ORDER IF YOU ARE FROM CANADA
text: DO NOT ORDER IF YOU ARE FROM CANADAHad to pay $30 for the cheapest shipping option. Ships through USPS and took almost 2 weeks to come, and I live somewhere popular. This wasn't including customs, it cleared in 2 hours. Just the slowest shipping speed possible. On top of this, the duties aren't covered under the shipping and had to pay $29 at the door. Just buy from a Canadian vendor unless you want to overpay by a lot.

title: Minimal if any effect other than…
text: Minimal if any effect other than diarrheaResponse to Liftmode: thanks for the reply and offer for a return, but it has been thrown out. I agree that people can have highly variable and individual responses, but I have consistently had noticeable effect with Phenibut in the past.

title: Fake phenibut powder.
text: I bought phenibut from liftmode. After taking it I went to emergency. My lips turned purple and my toes turned purple, doctors did a lot of things to bring me back to life, they told me I may have sequelae. Fake phenibut powder.

title: Discontinued
text: Well, I’d give 5 stars because I love this stuff. I understand the concern, but if used responsibly, this stuff is fantastic and improves quality of life. But now I’m giving 1 star since you’re discontinuing it. What a shame.

title: Phenibut review
text: I bought Phenibut to help with my insomnia. I have tried it twice and haven't noticed any help. There aren't any good instructions that come with it. I ordered the powder form and wondered how much water I should take it with, what time of day, and how much to take based on my weight. Google gives such a wide variety of answers its confusing and the Liftmode website lacks information pretty bad. It only warns of taking to much which is good to know but consumers need more information than that.

title: Couldn’t even make it through your…
text: Couldn’t even make it through your website. Every time I put in my credit information, it would disappear and tell me it needed it again. I couldn’t even get past that part so I went with another company with my purchase.

title: I've been buying phenibut for 10 years…
text: I've been buying phenibut for 10 years from you guys. Supply was drying up but phenibut F.A.A. was still there so I bought some. I asked Chet if you were discontinuing it. He said "Absolutely not", try back in a month. I came back and there's nothing. I ask Chet and he says yes, it's discontinued. Had he been honest, I would have bought a lot more while it was available. After 10 years, I would hope for some communication...like hey Brent, long time loyal customer, it's not looking good, get it while u can. Instead I got fed "absolutely not". Now I've been struggling to find anything I can out there.

title: Hi Stim junky here
text: For a stimulant, caffeine junky like myself these provide whack energy. I can’t justify buying more. I have to take 3 to get a buzz I can use, and it feels janky, not smooth. I prefer straight up 200mg caffeine or other alternatives I can save $$ on

title: Kanna 😕
text: I was expecting greater results, due to the great reviews concerning kanna. However,  this product did nothing for me, other than raise my heartbeat for 10 minutes, then subsided off into nothingness.  Wondering if there are other nootropics that may have greater results?

title: Loved how fast I received product and…
text: Loved how fast I received product and using your website is great.I did not get anything from this product regarding any change in mood. It is basically caffeine and I was disappointed! Will not buy again, lesson learned that it was to good to be true.

title: Phenibut Crystals don't work
text: Bought the Phenibut crystals and took the recommended dosage on the back of the jar and felt nothing, doubled the dosage once as it says you can take only 2 doses in 24 hours and still felt absolutely nothing. Waste of money. I guess that's what they mean when they say buy from a reputable company.

title: package not delivered
text: Was very excited about my order since i’ve heard nothing but good reviews about this company but my package was never delivered. Very disappointing since it was claimed to be delivered but the cameras on my house show that the package was not delivered at the time it was claimed to be.

title: It's now illegal in Alabama, due your research before buying sleep supplements from this company
text: I literally wrote to you asking about sleep supplements, vitamins! I was told that phenibut was and I quote from Leo " Phenibut is our strongest SUPPLEMENT for sleep support" I kept the email. I explained to him that I didn't want to use narcotic sleeping pills. I then find out, (which no told me)  that it's not recommended for human or animal consumption and its literally a drug that's being abused by people!!! Its also now illegal in Alabama!!! I would think that you would want to inform people of this rather then chase the Almighty dollar. It's simple, explain to people their options not send them something and then have them find out later. And do not tell me that it is covered on your website because I as a customer did my due diligence when I reached out to your customer service to begin with. To everyone out there understand what phenibut truly is!!

title: I've been a customer since 2016
text: I've been a customer since 2016, i can no longer afford your crazy prices for phenibut. By the time it got to my door it was well over $300. I also have to pay a duty, were as before i didn't. I've found another supplier for much cheaper so F U C K LIFTMODE

But this most recent order has been unacceptably delayed without acknowledgement or apology. It may be time to look elsewhere for my supplement experience.

title: I bought phenibut powder from you to…
text: I bought phenibut powder from you to help me sleep. But after I took your phenibut powder, it doesn't help me sleep, instead, it makes me very excited and can not sleep, and my heart failure and beat more than 100 times per minute and palpitation, my voice become hoarse, my neck and face grow long, my toes become purple and very painful, I lost my appetite. The worst thing is I can't sleep, it makes my entire body failure. I am in danger now and may die at anytime. I know some Chinese evil spies found you, they made up bad stories about me and pay you, and ask you add poison in my phenibut powder. They want to use this way to kill me. Now I know why the shipment delayed, you were buying time for Chinese evil spies to put poison in my order. You helped them to kill me. You have lost your conscience. You will be punished by God.

title: Liftmode stabs their customers in the back...
text: Liftmode (which is a goofy@$$ name to begin with-everytime I ordered from their I felt exponentially dumber ~ Which is funny bc some of the products are listed as "smart drugs".)They knowingly got countless people hooked on their drug "Phenibut" and then suddenly, with NO WARNING, pulled the product from their sales lineup. However, at least several months beforehand they reduced the amount you could buy from 1000grams down to just 5grams. Which meant if the addict needed 200grams... they would need to buy 40 - 5gram amounts @15$ per gram... would be 600$!!!!! Which normally would have been about 100$.They did this because Phenibut was the product they made the most money on and sold the most of. When they discontinue it their company will probably tank. They didnt care about their customers one bit - not even enough to give them advanced notice that they would no longer be selling it.Knowing these customers would go through excruciating withdrawal without doing a long taper... .meaning theyd have no choice but to buy all those 5 gram amounts or whatever they could afford. In the end making a killing in their financial  exit strategy. You should be able to give these ***********s NO STARS.

title: I've ordered plenty of stuff from…

And I messaged them and they said they would send another one. And I asked them to have UPS have someone sign for it the second time. But they it still didn't come the second time and nobody signed it. So my girlfriend called and demanded her money back. Because it was her card. And on  top of everything because of their mistake. They told us that they wouldn't sell anything to us anymore. This was not our fault. It was either liftmode or UPS that got it wrong. But they returned our money.but they actually blacklisted us. That's horrible customer service in my opinion. I'd give them zero stars if I could

title: Bought phenibut fine crystals
text: Bought phenibut fine crystals. I bought from them years ago and used to really respect them. 2 years ago, their phenibut was extremely potent. 2 grams used to work really well. I recently wanted to try them again for my birthday and even after taking 6 grams of whatever it is they sent me, all it would do is make me nauseous. Nothing. Else. I don’t care about the money or a guaranteed money back, I just wanted the same product I had years ago. This isn’t the first time they’ve done this as this happened to me last year when I stuck with them right before I was sick of buying bad stuff from them. So it’s been a year and I tried again for my birthday and nothing. Only thing I want to do is ward people off buying fake stuff, or stuff that’s really low quality. The fact that they are selling this means they care about the money when it’s coming in. I wouldn’t question their other products. They seem to have amazing ratings for everything else. But, hopefully this influences someone to be cautious buying any phenibut from them. This is just a comparison of what they used to sell, vs what they sell now

title: UPDATE!!
text: UPDATE!! I'M using my review, or actually just updating due to their reply. Let me just say first that I have never dealt with this company prior to this incident. Now with that being said, I'm just confused at to why they got so upset enough to end their relationship with me, that mind you hadn't even started yet, but they said I sounded like a risky customer. I don't even know what that means!!?? Yes, I did get very upset that my delivery wasn't shipped on the day it was supposed to be, but that's only bc I was leaving to go out off town for 3 weeks and I used my sis in laws card to pay for it, and she would be pissed if she got a package after I had left, I was wrong on that part, but I've surely to get already saved she said she got a refund from them today, which they did say they were gonna do. Also, I do want to say they even sent the package, even after refunding, bc she got it off the porch, it has my name on it, so that has to be what it was bc I haven't ordered anything else. So, that was really nice of them. I'm updating this review for a few reasons and I just feel like we had a huge misunderstanding and I feel awful about the whole thing. I am looking forward to trying the stuff I ordered, my sis in laws sister told me about it and said it is very helpful. I apologize to Liftmode for this misunderstanding!  OLDER REVIEW!! 09/29/2023 I'm not happy! This is the first time I ordered from this company. They have lied to me, and they responded once to my email. They promised my package would be shipped the very next business day, it's been 2 days and ups is claiming they haven't received the package. Liftmodes shipping email actually said they shipped it in the 3rd of October, but they promised it would be the 2nd. I've explained to them that I was at my brother's house and have to leave Thursday, if it arrives after that, I won't be able to get it. I will not order from them again if they don't fix this and compensate me.

text: Allows shipping to Thailand as an option but their products are FDA controlled and require a prescription or medical certificate in order to be delivered. Out $100 worth of product plus wasted time and resources as this requirement is not mentioned anywhere on their website.

text: The only option for delivery was UPS. If I knew that from the start I would never have ordered it. UPS was no help at all. And there was no way for me to cancel the order or ask for it to be taken back. Never again.

title: Wrong type and missing product
text: I take phenibut Hcl every day for anxiety and ptsd with only a 2 week break every 6 months. I’ve taken phenibut hcl for 6 years.Hcl crystals are not supposed to be the consistency of flour, but more like sugar. My phenibut is more like flour… but it does taste like it should.   My order was for 500g  HCL powder. I weighed the contents without the jar after taking only 2 grams and my digital scale read 454 grams… with the container it weighed slightly over 500 grams… So I got something that isn’t hcl powder and got 10% less product than I paid for. Will not be ordering from liftmode again.

title: Thanks guys this time the package was here as quickly as it possibly could have been,apparently my phone gave you my old address and it’s done that before so I’m sorry about my first review you guys !

title: Order never arrived.
text: This was my third time ordering from LiftMode.  My first two orders were great - no problems whatsoever.  This time, however, my package didn't arrive at all.  Tracking via UPS said that my order had been delivered, but I had nothing - no package, no delivery notice, etc.Not really even sure this is LiftMode's fault, but it was not a good experience.For the record, I have reached out to them and let them know.

title: website was fine but my order went to…

title: Item was paid for on 19 August 2020
text: Item was paid for on 19 August 2020. Today is 19 September 2020.Item has NOT BEEN RECEIVED! I did contact them for an explanation here is what Naila said: Hello,Please accept our sincerest apologies for this inconvenience.Kindly note your query has been forwarded to the concerned team. We will update you shortly on the same.In case you have any further questions or concerns about your order, feel free to reply to this email.Thanks and regards,NailaToday is 19 September. Still no UPDATE.

title: Honestly worried I was going to die
text: I've taken phenibut hcl on occasion for over a decade and know how it affects me. After using your product I ended up having to call 911 for the first time, and was taken to the emergency room. I experienced muscle spasms that felt like they were about to break me in half, symptoms akin to tardive dyskina, sweating like I never have before, and had difficulty breathing and speaking. I cannot attribute my experience to your product with 100% certainty since I am not paying to have it analyzed, but the only explanation I can think of is the product contained adulterants of some kind.

title: My order hasn’t shipped yet.

title: Possibly no fault of LiftMode
text: Because of "Boost my Biology" on YouTube I tried your products. I know phenibut is on it's way out and soon I won't be able to get it. The one pill that actually helps with my anxiety. And it seems like you are the last place where I could get it. But sadly it does not have the same effect it had when I was getting it from Nootropics Depot. So you realize when I last purchased Phenibut (they haven't sold it in almost a year.) I'm inclined to think with the growing difficulty to get Phenibut the quality has since declined. So while my purchase of Phenibut from you may be a disappointment I'm not sure if your company is at fault or the quality that is left around is just not there. Sad the government is once again interfering with substances that actually work. I will continue to make due with GABA until the government bans that too. I will try other products with your company to see how well they work before I put the blame solely on your products. Thanks.

title: Normally amazing, this time—not so great.
text: Historically liftmode has been awesome. Great customer service, always on point. This time sucked. I’m a Canadian customer, (always a pain) and I’ve been buying off them regularly since 2017. The item I usually order wasn’t available in the quantity I required, so when asked they assured me would be back in stock by the end of last week. Which it wasn’t. The item was available in smaller quantities, mind you at a much higher rate. I emailed them to see if there was something we could work out, and the only option I was given was to order the smaller versions. For some reason the shipping option I usually opt for, UPS, was at a highly inflated rate, in USD. This is the only time I’ve encountered this service being cost as such online, and I regularly buy items from the states. Because of this, I spent nearly the same amount, (roughly $360 CAD) for a fraction of what I normally purchase from them. Which sucks. Love you liftmode but you guys dropped the ball this time.

title: Terrible quality- not worth it unless you want to be sick
text: Unfortunately this Phenibut FAA isn’t great, it’s not even worth trying. I had read reviews saying that Liftmode had changed suppliers since the shortage of Phenibut and that it was terrible, when it used to be highly recommended, and I decided to try it anyways for occasional anxiety and depression episodes. The first time I tried it, I took exactly the recommended dose, and… nothing. I asked on a popular Reddit forum and they said to try dosing again up to 4x every 4-5 hours. After the second dose I got a massive migraine and felt dizzy, shaky and nauseous. I waited 5 days (it is not recommended to take this product more than 1-2 times per week) and it did nothing except make me extremely tired and again anxious. I tried one last time with a “good sized” dose and same thing- zero effects except shakiness and a little dizziness, some mild nausea and anxiety. I threw it away and am irritated that I wasted $68.00, I should’ve listened to the thousands of reviews saying it was terrible quality.

title: Terrible Customer Service
text: I attempted to place an order today, 3-28-22, for a product on their site.Their checkout process was not working, so I reached out to them in chats. They said they could process the order over the phone.I couldn't immediately place the order but told them I would call back.I started asking them questions in their in-website chat. I was browsing the internet at the same time and would come and go in the chat and ask questions as I thought of them.When I reached out some time later, an associate LEO told me I was wasting his time and that they had been tied up with me for an hour and a half with no resolution and me just asking the same questions over and over and it was taking away from their time to help other customers.I was unaware that keeping the chat open meant that they couldn't help other customers. I thought it ended and then picked back up once I typed something new.At several points during the chat, it would prompt me to rate the interaction. I rated each interaction honestly and did not act mean or hateful to any associate.LEO saw that I had rated one of our interactions negatively, so he launched into a tirade saying I was an abusive customer. He then sent me an email saying he banned my account.I tried to call and speak to someone and got ahold of LEO. He started yelling at me over the phone saying I was an abusive customer. I asked to speak to a Manager and LEO told me "they" didn't have time for that or for me.I then went back to the in-website chat and started asking questions about different products and LEO came on and said I was banned and they wouldn't sell any products to me.This was all within the span of about 1.5 hours where I was a new customer and just inquiring about their products and services.Somehow it went from me chatting with them in the app, to their employee LEO yelling at me over the phone, sending me emails that he was banning me and saying I was an abusive customer. All because I asked a few questions and needed some time to do my due diligence before ordering.If they are legitimate, they sure seem to be absolutely terrible at customer service.LEO attacked me verbally and then said I was the one who was abusive to them for asking questions.THEY sell supplements that are designed to “CALM” people down. Maybe LEO should consider taking the same supplements he’s selling on behalf of this company…I'm still trying to process this, but I would steer clear of this website at all costs. They have no patience and will blow up on you if they feel you've taken too much of their time or asked too many questions before handing over your Credit Card Information.Be careful...Addendum:If you are any person reading this (other than the LiftMode clan), please do this thought experiment for me. Do you think myself as a new customer just randomly decided out of the blue to suddenly get embroiled in a battle with an obscure website I had literally only discovered a few days ago, just for my own kicks, or is it possible that what I'm saying is real and actually happened?? I did NOT just seek out to become ensnared in a battle with a website I barely even knew existed. Everything I wrote in my review ACTUALLY happened. I have NO motive to make anything up and it would be an absolute WASTE of my time to fabricate or embellish anything. Look at how much time I've spent writing this review and how intricate and detailed I've made it. I wouldn't just do that if NOTHING happened and I was just wanting to without CAUSE, slander someone (as LEO claims).LEO claims I said I would slander him online. I NEVER said anything like that. After he yelled at me over the phone and sent me emails saying he was banning me, I responded to his email saying I would write as many reviews as I could about my experience with him. Honest reviews. LEO was unhelpful, hostile, aggressive and downright mean the entire interaction. And...he wants to just parrot my claims of his treatment towards me, back saying I did the same to him. I was professional and courteous. What started WW3 for LEO was after I rated an in-app chat negatively. He went from Hot to Cold instantaneously and then abruptly became defensive, aggressive and mean and emailed immediately that he was banning me.I found another website that sold the identical product for a 1/3 of their price. That associate threw in a freebie and same day shipping, along with a deep discount code. All while being unbelievably nice to me. I'm wondering why that website was overly helpful, but LEO and company were incredibly aggressive the entire time??LEO needs to take his own supplements he peddles. Because acting like that in life, is never acceptable. I was a brand new potential customer and LEO treated me like I was trash, yelling and screaming and threatening the entire time. He is NOT innocent! He is NOT the victim here. He is and was the AGGRESSOR.

title: Attention: I nearly lost my life do to phentibut
text: My name is Mishelae Alsandor. I'm 29 years old. I've struggled with anxiety for over a decade, so after in depth research on phentibut, liftmode seemed as if it was the most trusted company. I had a fantastic day when first taking it. But that very night I blacked out. Ended up in the E.R. not remembering a thing. I was told I was non responsive. I couldn't remember how I got there. My I didn't know the date time. All I knew was my mother's phone number. Phentibut is similar to a date rape drug. It's not a miracle supplement. I'm just now coming back out of my shell. And this is a 2 weeks later. Every medical professional thought it was a drug induced..writing it off as GHB.  Blood was drawn over 3 times. My mother insisted on cat scan. As I'm writing this very review I'm fading in and out. I was put in a crisis center twice in 24hrs. Waking up with night terrors. Bottom line. Don't believe the hype. This product nearly landed me in a room with padded walls. And I will be taking legal action. I truly hope liftmode reviews their reviews.

title: DO NOT PURCHASE WITH LIFTMODE!  SCAMMERS.
text: My opinion of this company has done a 360.  I purchased a tub of 1000 g large crystal phenibut.  When I went to open the tub the 'seal' which should have been intact around the lid had been cut around so the top was able to come off without breaking it.  Also, the actual seal to get at the product was missing.  I've been purchasing phenibut since 2007 from various sources and it's ALWAYS sealed. I called into their 'customer service' line quite upset and was told to take photos and send them in, which I did.  I will not lie.  I was escalated as that's a lot of money for me to spend on a supplement.   After this all 'customer service' ended with them and they avoided all my future contacts with them. I mean, they responded to me but wouldn't do anything.  For instance, I'd request a return label and they're reply with an email telling me they've sent me an email but there wouldn't be a return label attached, they'd say it might be in my junk mail, etc. One of my many calls into the call center were returned with someone leaving me a voicemail of them asking why I was calling?!  It was obvious by Saturday that they were playing a game with me and I told them I wasn't going to be ripped off.  Well, that got a reaction.  The chord was struck and they seemed to ramp up the passive aggressive behavior of returning my emails with "We're going to close this incident case since it appears to have been resolved" when nothing had been done.  So I'm out over $150.  I will not use this product as it's been opened.  Part of me is considering sending it back on my own dime but I'm afraid they'll claim non-receipt of the product and I'll be completely out of everything.  I'm hoping the owner or an investor in this company sees this and inquires into my experience.  It's horrible customer service.  If they did a bit of research on my past they'd see I had a good history.  A package they sent me got lost in the mail, they had to reship a package to me.  After a couple of weeks the first package they sent to me arrived, I got a return label from them and shipped it back.    It really is puzzling to me.  I tried leaving feedback on the Liftmode site but someone there changed my password on my account and made it so I couldn't reset it to leave feedback.  If an owner/investor is reading this my order number is 10040189050

title: These products have NOT been approved …
text: These products have NOT been approved in the United States as a form of treating depression, anxiety, or giving a calming effect. Doctors around our country are seeing an increase in rehab centers of people who have taken this dangerous substance. The issue comes when they try to stop taking the substance.First of all this substance is highly addictive. Over time, staying at the same dosage is impossible and you will have to increase the dosage to get the same effect. Second, it is NOT a natural vitamin or a natural supplement. It has ingredients similar to Meth and can cause hallucinations and a change in your personality when you try to quit. It destroys your dopamine receptors, making you feel depressed if you try to stop taking the substance.I am making it one of my missions to raise awareness. As a result, my sister is in the hospital because of this substance. She used this product for over a year. The scientific study that you use as a reference only lasted for 6 weeks.

title: Great company, bad product issues.
text: The customer service and everything to do with the website and company was great! As usual.. The product, however, made me very, very, very ill and I almost ended up in the hospital.I have taken phenibut before and I started off with lower than the recommended dose, as I usually do, and I was extremely ill, dizzy, and throwing up for 24 hours. I did not consume anything else in the prior to taking the phenibut that could have made me ill or ever has in the past. I'm not sure what happened or why this particular batch made me so ill, but I'm definitely afraid to take it again.

title: never got it
text: ten days so far- the shipment is still in Chicago

title: ALL SMOKE AND MIRRORS
text: My package was sent to the wrong address. Before it arrived I contacted customer service and they said it would be faster if they sent me a knew one instead of rerouting it. The new package was never sent. Fast forward a few days, I contacted them again and they said they would resend it first thing on Monday. After 3pm I finally get a message that it was "sent."  But they used the same order number as the first pakage so I couldn't track it on Liftmode's website because it only showed info on first pakage to the wrong address. It's been a few days now, and USPS only shows "pre shippment" tracking and report they never received it. I live in the same area as the company and still haven't received anything after about two weeks. I can take the mislabeling, it happens, but cannot understand the multiple lies just for this transaction.  Reusing the same order number shows laziness. I now question the legitimacy of their health products.  I also informed them of the urgency needed on the resend but they still used the slowest route (first class).  At this point it will not matter when it comes because I will not be home for weeks now.  It didn't mind hearing they paid people for writing good reviews, but after this I have lost confidence in them, especially because they sell "health supplements."

title: No product... No review...
text: I ordered over a week ago and still no product. I followed tracking and it had a "Scheduled Delivery" of 3 days ago. While I was tracking it claimed to be out for delivery 4 days ago and I got nothing. I checked the tracking and got a message of  "The shipment is being held. Commodity description information must be validated by the sender. / Delivery will be rescheduled." I contacted the shipper who was not very helpful but gave me a USPS tracking # because use of Sharepost but she assured me it would be delivered the next day (3 days ago, it has been sitting in my town for over 4 days). Got another tracking # for USPS, which now shows invalid # and I am just getting the same response. It is a shame because I also was about to try their Noopept 5gm deal and possible switch suppliers :(
